articles.title: The gold medals at the Tokyo Olympics are just 1.2% gold - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Every medal handed out at the Tokyo Olympics weighs at least one pound. But the first place prizes contain only 1/100th of a pound of gold.
articles.content:
